text:
Database
Allow students to collect, share and search created artifacts
Tricky to set up. Know what you want before you build.
Can be used for teacher to present info, but better to let the students add to it.
Database is versatile and allows evaluation. Design the right learning activity.
Not suited for discussions. Students can comment or rate other entries.
Students can share content in searchable way. Create joint collections.

6 / 6
Allows to test the six levels, by structuring the knowledge.
